public class Company
extends Object
implements Serializable
Company <> - this class does the bookeeping of keeping track of employees and rooms.

cancel_room_schedule(Schedulable, Time_Slot)
Cancels the time slot from the room.
cancel_schedule(Vector, Time_Slot)
Cancels the time slot from each employee.
find_employee(Identity)
Finds the employee indicated by the name key.
get_instance()
Use this to get the company object to request or cancel a meeting.
input_employee_list(Schedulable, Time_Slot)
For the given time slot, get a list of employees to attend the meeting.
input_room(Time_Slot)
Return a room that is free for the given time slot.
main(String[])
Used by the company administrator.
update_master_file()
Save off the data for the company.

get_instance 
 public static final Company get_instance()
Use this to get the company object to request or cancel a meeting.

input_employee_list 
 public Vector input_employee_list(Schedulable originator,
                                   Time_Slot slot)
For the given time slot, get a list of employees to attend the meeting. Returns null if the user cancels the request.

input_room 
 public Schedulable input_room(Time_Slot slot)
Return a room that is free for the given time slot. Returns null if the user cancels.

cancel_schedule 
 public void cancel_schedule(Vector employees,
                             Time_Slot slot)
Cancels the time slot from each employee.

cancel_room_schedule 
 public void cancel_room_schedule(Schedulable room,
                                  Time_Slot slot)
Cancels the time slot from the room.

find_employee 
 public Employee find_employee(Identity id)
Finds the employee indicated by the name key.

update_master_file 
 public void update_master_file() throws Exception
Save off the data for the company.

main 
 public static void main(String args[])
Used by the company administrator. Used to add and delete rooms. Also used to create a new company file. A person who wants to schedule a meeting should run Employee instead.
